audioinput: Stereo mini-pin jack (3.5-mm diameter; plug-in power supported)
accessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
nikoncreativelightingsystemcls: Advanced Wireless Lighting supported with built-in flash, SB-910, SB-900, SB-800 or SB-700 as a master flash and SB-600 or SB-R200 as remotes, or SU-800 as commander; built-in flash can serve as master flash in commander mode; auto FP high-speed sync and modeling illumination supported with all CLS-compatible flash units except SB-400; Flash Color Information Communication and FV lock supported with all CLS-compatible flash units
exposurebracketing: 2 to 3 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1, 2 or 3 EV
weight: Approx. 850 g/1 lb 14.0 oz with battery and memory card but without body cap; approx. 760 g/1 lb 10.8 oz (camera body only)
flashsyncspeed: X=1/200 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/250 s or slower (flash range drops at speeds between 1/200 and 1/250 s)
metering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
modes: Live view photography (still images), movie live view (movies)
exposurecompensation: Can be adjusted by -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV in P, S, A and M modes
activedlighting: Auto, Extra high, High, Normal, Low, Off
maximumlength: Approx. 29 min. 59 s (20 min. depending on frame size/rate and movie quality settings)
releasemodes: S (single frame), CL (continuous low speed), CH (continuous high speed), Q (quiet shutter-release), QC (quiet continuous shutter-release), (self-timer), (remote control), MUP (mirror up)
frameadvancerate: Approx. 1 to 5 fps (CL), approx. 6 fps (CH) or 3 fps (QC)
speed: 1/4,000 to 30 s in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV, bulb, time (requires optional ML-L3 Remote Control), X200
batterypack: Optional MB-D14 Multi-Power Battery Pack with one EN-EL15 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery or six AA alkaline, Ni-MH, or lithium batteries
suppliedaccessoriesmaydifferbycountryora: EN-EL15 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery, MH-25 Battery Charger, DK-5 Eyepiece Cap, DK-21 Rubber Eyecup, UC-E15 USB Cable, AN-DC10 Camera Strap, BM-14 LCD Monitor Cover, BF-1B Body Cap, BS-1 Accessory Shoe Cover, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM
isosensitivityrecommendedexposureindex: ISO 100 to 6400 in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV; can also be set to approx. 0.3, 0.5, 0.7 or 1 EV (ISO 50 equivalent) below ISO 100 or to approx. 0.3, 0.5, 0.7, 1 or 2 EV (ISO 25600 equivalent) above ISO 6400; auto ISO sensitivity control available
media: SD (Secure Digital) and UHS-I compliant SDHC and SDXC memory cards
selftimer: 2 s, 5 s, 10 s, 20 s; 1 to 9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2 or 3 s
magnification: Approx. 0.7x (50 mm f/1.4 lens at infinity, -1.0 m -1 )
playback: Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9, 72 images or calendar) playback with playback zoom, movie playback, photo and/or movie slide shows, histogram display, highlights, photo information, GPS data display and auto image rotation
operatingenvironment: Temperature: 0 to 40°C/32 to 104°F; humidity: 85% or less (no condensation)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 141 x 113 x 82 mm/ 5.6 x 4.4 x 3.2 in.
autofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected)
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (M)
accessoryterminal: Remote cord: MC-DC2 (available separately) GPS unit: GP-1/GP-1A (available separately)
focuspoint: Can be selected from 39 or 11 focus points
afareamodes: Face-priority AF, wide-area AF, normal-area AF, subject-tracking AF
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal and Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
picturecontrolsystem: Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified; storage for custom Picture Controls
imagesizepixels: FX format (36x24): 6,016 x 4,016 (L), 4,512 x 3,008 (M), 3,008 x 2,008 (S) DX format (24x16): 3,936 x 2,624 (L), 2,944 x 1,968 (M), 1,968 x 1,312 (S) FX-format photographs taken in movie live view: 6,016 x 3,376 (L), 4,512 x 2,528 (M), 3,008 x 1,688 (S) DX-format photographs taken in movie live view: 3,936 x 2,224 (L), 2,944 x 1,664 (M), 1,968 x 1,112 (S)
remotereleasemodes: Delayed remote, quick-response remote, remote mirror-up
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF) or by pressing AE-L/AF-L button
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VIII screen with AF area brackets (framing grid can be displayed)
adlbracketing: 2 frames using selected value for one frame or 3 frames using preset values for all frames
whitebalancebracketing: 2 to 3 frames in steps of 1, 2 or 3
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 2,016-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, SB-400 or SB-300; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
lensmount: Nikon F mount (with AF coupling and AF contacts)
dualcardslots: Slot 2 can be used for overflow or backup storage or for separate storage of copies created using NEF+JPEG; pictures can be copied between cards
rangeiso100f14lens20c68f: Matrix or center-weighted metering: 0 to 20 EV Spot metering: 2 to 20 EV
monitor: Monitor 8-cm (3.2-in.), approx. 921k-dot (VGA), low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD with approx. 170° viewing angle, approx. 100% frame coverage, and automatic monitor brightness control using ambient brightness sensor
eyepoint: 21 mm (-1.0 m -1 ; from center surface of viewfinder eyepiece lens)
acadapter: EH-5b AC Adapter; requires EP-5B Power Connector (available separately)
flashbracketing: 2 to 3 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1, 2 or 3 EV
compatiblelenses: Compatible with AF NIKKOR lenses, including type G,E and D lenses (some restrictions apply to PC lenses), DX lenses [using DX (24x16) image area], AI-P NIKKOR lenses, and non-CPU AI lenses (A and M modes only); IX-NIKKOR lenses, lenses for the F3AF, and non-AI lenses cannot be used The electronic rangefinder can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster (the electronic rangefinder supports the center 7 focus points with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/8 or faster and the center 33 focus points with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/6.8 or faster)
filesystem: DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0, DPOF (Digital Print Order Format), Exif (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) 2.3, PictBridge
flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off; auto FP high-speed sync supported
imagesensor: 35.9 x 24.0 mm CMOS sensor (Nikon FX format)
exposuremodes: Auto ( auto; auto [flash off]), scene ( portrait, landscape, child, sports, close up, night portrait, night landscape, party/indoor, beach/snow, sunset, dusk/dawn, pet portrait, candlelight, blossom, autumn colors, food, silhouette, high key, low key), programmed auto with flexible program (P), shutter-priority auto (S), aperture-priority auto (A), manual (M), U1 (user settings 1), U2 (user settings 2)
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit is fully charged; flashes after flash is fired at full output
depthoffieldpreview: Pressing depth-of-field preview button stops lens aperture down to value selected by user (A and M modes) or by camera (other modes)
framesizepixelsandframerate: 1,920 x 1,080; 30p (progressive), 25p, 24p 1,280 x 720; 60p, 50p, 30p, 25p Actual frame rates for 60p, 50p, 30p, 25p, and 24p are 59.94, 50, 29.97, 25, and 23.976 fps respectively; options support both ★ high and normal image quality
builtinflash: , , , , , , : Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M, : Manual pop-up with button release
audiorecordingdevice: Built-in monaural or external stereo microphone; sensitivity adjustable
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
dustreductionsystem: Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
framecoverage: FX (36x24): Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical DX (24x16): Approx. 97% horizontal and 97% vertical
whitebalance: Auto (2 types), incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual (up to 4 values can be stored), choose color temperature (2,500 K to 10,000 K); all with fine-tuning
